price: Jika kamu sangat mengharapkan agar mereka dapat petunjuk, maka sesungguhnya Allah tiada memberi petunjuk kepada orang yang disesatkan-Nya dan sekali-kali mereka tiada mempunyai penolong.
arabic: إِن تَحۡرِصۡ عَلَىٰ هُدَىٰهُمۡ فَإِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يَهۡدِي مَن يُضِلُّۖ وَمَا لَهُم مِّن نَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: in taḥriṣ ʿalā hudāhum fa-inna al-laha lā yahdī man yuḍillu wamā lahum min nāṣirīna
